biography: High performance haircare rooted in nature since 1978. Vegan and cruelty-free.🐰 Book your salon experience here 👇 #Aveda

latestIgtvVideos.caption:
One-of-a-kind hair colour, without compromise. ✨

Featuring certified organic sunflower, jojoba, coconut and babassu oils, our 100% vegan Aveda Hair Colour transforms your look while respecting our planet. Our plant-based professional colour service lets you pick your unique, fade-resistant tone while conditioning damaged hair.

See link in bio to book your Aveda Hair Colour Service now or call +91 93219 12038 

#AvedaHairColour #AvedaCares #VeganHairColour #HairColourIdeas #HairShades #CrueltyFreeHairCare

Let’s remember to always take care of our three homes––our body, community and planet.

How are we at Aveda caring for the three homes we live in?
🌱 With high-level performance, vegan formulas we’re bringing care for hair, skin and body.
💇‍♀️ Through our empowering Aveda Artists and YOU, our customers, we’re nurturing community.
🌎 Our love and devotion for the Earth can be seen in our manufacturing, ingredients and packaging.

#Earth #AvedaCares #AvedaIndia #Aveda #Sustainability

Decadent, creamy and 100% vegan, our NEW Nutriplenish Treatment Masque Deep Moisture for medium-to-thick hair of all textures: 

❤️ Restores depleted, very dry hair with decadent hydration
❤️ Increases manageability to define your look
❤️ Noticeably hydrates tresses with added butters and oils*

Revitalize your look with modern vegan moisture!

*2.5x the butters and oils compared to Nutriplenish Treatment Masque Light Moisture

#NutriplenishEffect #Hydrated Hair #HairHydration

Infuse your hair with our unique combination of plants, botanicals and essences for the results you crave.
✨ Organic amla, hand-harvested to perfection for thicker, fuller-looking hair in our Invati Advanced collection.
✨ Organic coconut oil retains hair moisture for lasting results in our Nutriplenish collection.

Ready to experience our 100% vegan hair care overflowing with zest and nourishment?

#VeganHairCare #Vegan #VeganLifestyle #VeganHairProducts #Aveda #AvedaHair #AvedaIndia #Organic

One year, 100% vegan, we've continued to grow in our standards for high-performance vegan hair care.

Join us as we take the #Veganuary2022 pledge and fully embrace the power of plants and botanicals. Make one simple change and include our 100% vegan formulas in your routine.

Ready to begin? Visit aveda.com to get inspired and sign up.

#VeganHairCare #Veganuary #WeAreVeganuary #Aveda #AvedaIndia #Vegan #VeganHairProducts

Going vegan without giving up performance required setting new innovative ingredients into motion. Harnessing the bountiful plants and botanicals for our formulas to ensure we weren't compromising performance was a challenge worth accepting. At Aveda, we believe there is no compromise needed for high-performance hair care and caring for the world we live in. We can do both.

Ready to experience 100% vegan, high-performance hair care made with care? Discover our revolutionary vegan hair care on www.nykaa.com today

#VeganHairCare #Veganuary2022 #WeAreVeganuary

Brushing your hair just got a lot more beautiful! Aveda Wooden Paddle Brush is a professional brush featuring extended bristles for easy detangling and reduces stress to hair and scalp during blow-drying and styling.

#Aveda #AvedaHair #HairStyling #HairBrush #AvedaHairCare #HairCare #HairGoals

An evolution of our mission of care: from vegetarian to vegan🍃 Aveda has been cruelty-free since it was founded in 1978. We are proud to be 100% vegan, now & forever. 

#WorldVeganDay #Vegan #VeganHairCare #Aveda #AvedaCares #AvedaIndia

Whether you need moisture, strength, or shine, Aveda shampoos cater to all your hair needs, leaving it feeling refreshed, healthy, and beautiful. Treat your hair to a clean start every time.

latestPosts.caption:
Who says hair colour has to come with damage?

Most dyes dry your strands out—but @avedaindia proves it doesn’t have to be that way.

@avedaindia ‘s hair color is 95% naturally derived and 100% vegan, infused with nourishing botanical oils like avocado, coconut, and baobob. These ingredients work together to hydrate, strengthen, and protect hair during the coloring process.

The result? No dryness, no damage- just rich, lasting color and hair that feels even healthier than before.

It’s not just about looking good; it’s about choosing products that care for your hair and the planet.

#AvedaIndia #PlantPoweredBeauty #CleanHairCare #MindfulChoices #NonToxicBeauty #HolisticHairCare #ConsciousBeauty

taggedUsers.full_name: Aveda X Nykaa lifestyle salon Mumbai

latestPosts.caption:
From dull to dazzling. 💧 Watch as Aveda’s Nourishing Serum works its magic—reviving and hydrating dry strands, leaving them soft, shiny, and full of life. Whether you have thick, curly, or fine hair, this serum provides the perfect balance of moisture and nourishment to keep your hair looking its absolute best, all day long.

#Aveda #AvedaIndia #StrengthFromWithin #HairFortifying #PlantPoweredStrength #HealthyHairRevolution #NourishAndProtect #HolisticHairCare #SustainableBeauty

I’ve colored my hair so many times before but this time was different.
Not because of the shade, but because of the intention.

No harsh chemicals. No hidden animal stuff.
Just a 96% naturally derived hair treatment not just a color.

My hair’s been through a lot over the years… bleach, breakage, bold decisions made at 2am.
This time, I just wanted to choose better. For my hair. For me.

@avedaindia made that possible with a vegan, plant-powered color that actually treats your hair while coloring it.

It felt less like a dye job, more like a ritual.
And honestly? My hair’s never felt softer, lighter, or more me.

latestPosts.caption:
This Earth Day wasn’t just about planting trees it was about planting kindness.

Alongside our plantation drive, we visited Friendicoes Animal Sanctuary, where we shared time, care, and love with animals that truly needed it. @friendicoes_del 

Because building a better planet means caring for every life on it.

#EarthDay2025 #ShikharDhawanFoundation #AvedaIndia #Friendicoes #PlanetWithCompassion #KindnessIsSustainable
